mapper.select: SELECT A.NUM AS memberNum , A.ID AS memberId , A.PWD AS memberPwd , A.EMAIL AS memberEmail , A.NAME AS memberName , A.AGE AS memberAge , A.GENDER AS memberGender , A.HEIGHT AS memberHeight , A.WEIGHT AS memberWeight , A.STATUS AS memberStatus , A.REPORT_COUNT AS memberReportCount , A.DAILY_REPORT_COUNT AS memberDailyReportCount , A.GOOD_COUNT AS memberGoodCount , A.MONTHLY_GOOD_COUNT AS memberMonthlyGoodCount , A.CHEER_COUNT AS memberCheerCount , A.MESSAGE_ALLOW AS memberMessageAllow FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.ID = #{selectMemberId}
